sourcesContent:
import { useState } from 'react'; const mockData = { languages: [ { name: 'JavaScript', count: 3251, percentage: 28.4, color: '#f1e05a' }, { name: 'Python', count: 2532, percentage: 22.1, color: '#3572A5' }, { name: 'Java', count: 1753, percentage: 15.3, color: '#b07219' }, { name: 'TypeScript', count: 1425, percentage: 12.5, color: '#2b7489' }, { name: 'Go', count: 842, percentage: 7.4, color: '#00ADD8' }, { name: 'C++', count: 687, percentage: 6.0, color: '#f34b7d' }, { name: 'Rust', count: 423, percentage: 3.7, color: '#dea584' }, { name: 'Ruby', count: 371, percentage: 3.2, color: '#701516' }, { name: 'PHP', count: 183, percentage: 1.6, color: '#4F5D95' }, { name: '其他', count: 119, percentage: 1.0, color: '#ededed' } ], totalRepositories: 11456 }; // 根据语言名称生成颜色 const getLanguageColor = (language) => { const colorMap = { JavaScript: '#f1e05a', TypeScript: '#2b7489', Python: '#3572A5', Java: '#b07219', Go: '#00ADD8', 'C++': '#f34b7d', Ruby: '#701516', PHP: '#4F5D95', Rust: '#dea584', 'C#': '#178600', Swift: '#ffac45', Kotlin: '#F18E33' }; return colorMap[language] || `hsl(${Math.abs(language.split('').reduce((acc, char) => acc + char.charCodeAt(0), 0)) % 360}, 70%, 60%)`; }; const LanguageDistribution = () => { const [data] = useState(mockData); return (

编程语言分布

{data.totalRepositories.toLocaleString()}
仓库总数
{data.languages.length - 1}
主要语言
{data.languages[0].name}
最流行语言
{data.languages[0].percentage}% 的仓库

语言分布图

{/* 在实际项目中，这里会使用Recharts、Chart.js等库实现饼图 */}
{data.languages.slice(0, 8).map((language, index) => (
{language.name}
))}

按语言比较

{data.languages.map(language => (
{language.name}
{language.count.toLocaleString()} ({language.percentage}%)
))}

语言列表

{data.languages.map(language => (
{language.name}
{language.count.toLocaleString()} 个仓库
))}
); }; export default LanguageDistribution;
